name: ERC20 Mintable [DUMMY]
description: ERC20 fungible token with initial supply and the ability to mint and burn the tokens. Anyone can mint any amount of tokens.

eventDecorators.name: Token spending approval
eventDecorators.description: Indicates that approval to spend ERC20 token has occurred.

parameterDecorators.name: Approver address
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the owner who approved spending of their ERC20 token.

parameterDecorators.name: Spender address
parameterDecorators.description: Address for which the owner has approved to spend their ERC20 token.

parameterDecorators.name: Approved token amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of ERC20 token that was approved for spending.

eventDecorators.name: Token transfer
eventDecorators.description: Indicates that ERC20 transfer has occurred.

parameterDecorators.name: Sender address
parameterDecorators.description: Address from which the ERC20 token was sent.

parameterDecorators.name: Recipient address
parameterDecorators.description: Address to which the ERC20 token was sent.

parameterDecorators.name: Token amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of ERC20 token that was send.

constructorDecorators.name: Constructor
constructorDecorators.description: Deployes the ERC20 token with given token name and symbol.

parameterDecorators.name: Token name
parameterDecorators.description: Name of the token which will be deployed.

parameterDecorators.name: Token symbol
parameterDecorators.description: Symbol of the token which will be depoyed.

functionDecorators.name: Get allowance
functionDecorators.description: Returns the amount of tokens that the spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the approving owner.

parameterDecorators.name: Approver address
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the owner which approved spending.

parameterDecorators.name: Spender address
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the spender.

returnDecorators.name: Approved token amount
returnDecorators.description: The amount which was approved for spending.

functionDecorators.name: Approve token spending
functionDecorators.description: Grants the third party (first parameter) an access to spend a given amount of tokens (second parameter) from the caller's wallet.

parameterDecorators.name: Spender address
parameterDecorators.description: Wallet address of the third party.

parameterDecorators.name: Approved token amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount to approve for spending.

returnDecorators.name: Operation succeeded
returnDecorators.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

functionDecorators.name: Get balance
functionDecorators.description: Returns the amount of ERC20 tokens owned by the given wallet address

parameterDecorators.name: Account address
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the account for which the balance is being checked.

returnDecorators.name: Token amount
returnDecorators.description: The amount of the ERC20 tokens owned by the specified account.

functionDecorators.name: Burn tokens
functionDecorators.description: Destroys the given amount of the tokens from the caller's wallet

parameterDecorators.name: Token amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of tokens to burn from the caller's wallet.

functionDecorators.name: Burn approved tokens
functionDecorators.description: Burn the tokens from the given wallet. Token owner must approve the caller before the caller can call this function.

parameterDecorators.name: Wallet address
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the wallet to burn the tokens from.

parameterDecorators.name: Token amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of tokens to burn from the given wallet.

functionDecorators.name: Get ERC20 decimals
functionDecorators.description: Returns the number of decimals used by this ERC20 token.

returnDecorators.name: Decimal places
returnDecorators.description: Number of decimals used by this ERC20 token.

functionDecorators.name: Decrease approved amount
functionDecorators.description: Decrease the amount approved to the third party (first parameter) by the given amount (second parameter). Given amount is subtracted from the already approved amount.

parameterDecorators.name: Spender address
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the spender for whom the allowed spending amount will be decreased.

parameterDecorators.name: Amount to subtract
parameterDecorators.description: The amount which will be subtracted from the current allowed amount to spend.

returnDecorators.name: Operation succeeded
returnDecorators.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

functionDecorators.name: Increase approved amount
functionDecorators.description: Increases the amount of funds that can be spent by a third party (first parameter) by the given amount (second parameter). Given amount is added to the already approved amount.

parameterDecorators.name: Spender address
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the spender for whom the allowed spending amount will be increased.

parameterDecorators.name: Amount to add
parameterDecorators.description: The amount which will be added to the current allowed amount to spend.

returnDecorators.name: Operation succeeded
returnDecorators.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

functionDecorators.name: Mint
functionDecorators.description: Creates new amount of tokens (second parameter) and assigns them to the given wallet (first parameter). This function is only callable by the token owner. To find who the token owner is, call `owner()` funciton.

parameterDecorators.name: Wallet address
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the wallet to receive the newly created tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: Token amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of the tokens to create.

functionDecorators.name: Get token name
functionDecorators.description: Returns the name of this ERC20 token.

returnDecorators.name: Token name
returnDecorators.description: The name of this ERC20 token.

functionDecorators.name: Get token symbol
functionDecorators.description: Returns the symbol of this ERC20 token.

returnDecorators.name: Token symbol
returnDecorators.description: The symbol of this ERC20 token.

functionDecorators.name: Get total token supply
functionDecorators.description: Returns the total supply of this ERC20 token.

returnDecorators.name: Total token supply
returnDecorators.description: The total supply of this ERC20 token.

functionDecorators.name: Transfer tokens
functionDecorators.description: Transfers the specified ERC20 token amount (second parameter) from caller to the given address (first parameter).

parameterDecorators.name: Recipient address
parameterDecorators.description: Address to which the ERC20 tokens will be sent.

parameterDecorators.name: Token amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of ERC20 tokens to send.

returnDecorators.name: Operation succeeded
returnDecorators.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

functionDecorators.name: Transfer approved tokens
functionDecorators.description: Transfers the specified ERC20 token amount from one address to another. The caller must have an approval to spend tokens from the sender address.

parameterDecorators.name: Sender address
parameterDecorators.description: Source address from which the ERC20 tokens will be sent.

parameterDecorators.name: Recipient address
parameterDecorators.description: Address to which the ERC20 tokens will be sent.

parameterDecorators.name: Token amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of ERC20 tokens to send.

returnDecorators.name: Operation succeeded
returnDecorators.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.
